api.entity.interfaces

Interface Item

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EnigmaContainer, Entity, IDInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Activatable, Book, Button, Chest, Door, Floor, Pane, PressurePlate, Switch

    public interface Item
extends EnigmaContainer, Entity
    Définie une entité comme un item
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
    See Also:
    EnigmaContainer, Entity
